quote: Discrimination is a hellhound that gnaws at Negroes in every waking moment of their lives to remind them that the lie of their inferiority is accepted as truth in the society dominating them.
quote_letters: DISCRIMINATION IS A HELLHOUND THAT GNAWS AT NEGROES IN EVERY WAKING MOMENT OF THEIR LIVES TO REMIND THEM THAT THE LIE OF THEIR INFERIORITY IS ACCEPTED AS TRUTH IN THE SOCIETY DOMINATING THEM
